item.title: Survey: Americans say $800K needed to feel secure
item.description: A new Charles Schwab survey finds many Americans believe they need over $800,000 to be financially comfortable, yet a third have no financial plan. CB...

item.title: What assets can you lose if you file for bankruptcy?
item.description: Filing for bankruptcy can wipe out debt, but it might also cost you. Here's what you risk losing in the process.

item.title: RNC's Whatley and ex-Gov. Cooper plan to run for Senate in N.C., sources say
item.description: The White House has blessed Republican National Committee chairman Michael Whatley's plans, one source said.
